## Launcher.create() method

Create a new Launcher object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static create(rootPath: string, name: string, javaExec: string, clientId: string, launcherInterface: LauncherInterface, lang?: string, downloader?: (url: string, filename: fs.PathLike, oldURL: string) => Promise<void>, copy?: (arg: string) => void): Promise<Launcher>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rootPath | string | path to .minecraft |
|  name | string | Launcher name. |
|  javaExec | string | [Launcher.usingJava](./dmclc.launcher.usingjava.md) |
|  clientId | string | Microsoft identify platform APP id. |
|  launcherInterface | LauncherInterface |  |
|  lang | string | _(Optional)_ |
|  downloader | (url: string, filename: fs.PathLike, oldURL: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | _(Optional)_ Custom downloading function. |
|  copy | (arg: string) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ Custom clipboard function. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Launcher](./dmclc.launcher.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Launcher.
